title: Darkest Knight
description: Reunited with his estranged brother, Frankie, and closer than ever to his chosen family—the brothers of his heart—Marcus Prater and his lover Benjamin Danvers should be busy planning their first holiday season together. Not looking for the murderer of a too-young-to-die rent boy.As the pieces of their case come together, one piece of his family is coming apart—and it’s Wicked painful to watch.Will this be the brothers’ darkest night?
author: T.A. Webb
